    (NP
      (NP (PRP$ My) (NNS apologies))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP know)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (ADVP (DT all))
            (VP (VBP love)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ fermented) (NN grape) (NN juice))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP am)
              (ADJP (JJ sure)
                (SBAR (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP it))
                    (VP (MD can)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (VP (VBN paired)
                          (PP (IN with)
                            (NP (NNP Dim) (NNP Sum))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

    (. .)))
